name: Ultimate Ghosts 'n Goblins
description:
Run faster, jump higher, make the dead deader.

Princess Prin Prin has once again been kidnapped and it's up to Arthur to come to her rescue. Join Arthur as he battles through hordes of undead in this new addition of the GHOSTS 'N GOBLINS series.
